00021 using System;
00022 using System.Threading;
00023 using System.Collections;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Utils;
00027 using Niry.Network;
00028 
00029 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00030     public class UserInfoException : Exception {
00031         public UserInfoException (string msg) : base(msg) {}
00032         public UserInfoException (string msg, Exception inner) : base(msg, inner) {}
00033     }
00034 
00036     public class UserInfo : IComparable {
00037         // ============================================
00038         // PROTECTED Members
00039         // ============================================
00040         protected Hashtable informations = null;
00041         protected bool secureAuth;
00042         protected string name;
00043         protected string ip;
00044         protected int port;
00045     
00046         // ============================================
00047         // PUBLIC Constructors
00048         // ============================================
00050         public UserInfo (string username) {
00051             this.informations = Hashtable.Synchronized(new Hashtable());
00052             this.secureAuth = false;
00053             this.name = username;
00054             this.port = 7085;
00055         }
00056 
00058         public UserInfo (string username, bool secureAuth) {
00059             this.informations = Hashtable.Synchronized(new Hashtable());
00060             this.secureAuth = secureAuth;
00061             this.name = username;
00062             this.port = 7085;
00063         }
00064 
00066         public UserInfo (string username, bool secureAuth, string magic) {
00067             this.informations = Hashtable.Synchronized(new Hashtable());
00068             this.secureAuth = secureAuth;
00069             this.name = username;
00070             this.port = 7085;
00071             this.informations.Add("magic", magic);
00072         }
00073 
00074         // ============================================
00075         // PUBLIC Methods (HttpRequest Required)
00076         // ============================================
00078         public void GetIpAndPort() {
00079             if (secureAuth == true) {
00080                 this.ip = HttpRequest.Ip(this);
00081                 this.port = HttpRequest.Port(this);
00082             }
00083         }
00084 
00086         public void SetIpAndPort (string ip, int port) {
00087             this.ip = ip;
00088             this.port = port;
00089         }
00090 
00091         // ============================================
00092         // PUBLIC Methods
00093         // ============================================
00095         public string GetName() {
00096             // username@domain
00097             int domainStart = name.LastIndexOf('@');
00098             if (domainStart < 0) return(name);
00099             return(name.Substring(0, domainStart));
00100         }
00101 
00103         public string GetDomain() {
00104             // username@domain
00105             int domainStart = name.LastIndexOf('@');
00106             if (domainStart < 0) return(null);
00107             return(name.Substring(domainStart + 1));
00108         }
00109 
00111         public int CompareTo (object userInfo) {
00112             return(CompareTo((UserInfo) userInfo));
00113         }
00114 
00116         public int CompareTo (UserInfo userInfo) {
00117             int cmp = Name.CompareTo(userInfo.Name);
00118 
00119             // if usernames are equals but not secure auth return 1
00120             if (userInfo.SecureAuthentication != SecureAuthentication)
00121                 return((cmp == 0) ? 1 : cmp);
00122 
00123             return(cmp);
00124         }
00125 
00126         // ============================================
00127         // PRIVATE Methods
00128         // ============================================
00129 
00130         // ============================================
00131         // PUBLIC Properties
00132         // ============================================
00134         public Hashtable Informations {
00135             get { return(this.informations); }
00136         }
00137         
00139         public string Name {
00140             get { return(this.name); }
00141             set { this.name = value; }
00142         }
00143 
00145         public string Ip {
00146             get { return(this.ip); }
00147             set { this.ip = value; }
00148         }
00149 
00151         public int Port {
00152             get { return(this.port); }
00153             set { this.port = value; }
00154         }
00155 
00157         public bool SecureAuthentication {
00158             get { return(this.secureAuth); }
00159             set { this.secureAuth = value; }
00160         }
00161 
00163         public bool IsOnline {
00164             get {
00165                 if (P2PManager.KnownPeers == null) return(false);
00166                 return(P2PManager.KnownPeers.ContainsKey(this));
00167             }
00168         }
00169     }
00170 }
